articles.content: One of the chief advantages of comedy set to music is that our ears like musical repetition. We get pleasure out of hearing the same song over and over again, but jokes rarely age well. This is paten… [+5927 chars]

articles.author: Tatiana Tenreyro
articles.title: Stephanie Beatriz recorded Encanto's "Waiting On A Miracle" while she was in labor - The A.V. Club
articles.description: The former Brooklyn Nine-Nine truly was waiting on a miracle while singing the song
articles.content: When Stephanie Beatriz sang Waiting On A Miracle for Encanto, her life imitated art, presumably more than the actorwho was pregnant at the timeexpected when she signed on for the film. In an intervie… [+1684 chars]

articles.author: Zachary Woolfe
articles.title: Metropolitan Opera’s Concert Honors Ukraine - The New York Times
articles.description: A concert to benefit relief efforts featured a young Ukrainian singer, Beethoven’s “Ode to Joy” and the Met’s prima donna of the moment.
articles.content: Nézet-Séguins conducting in this famous finale was neither grand nor patient; when the orchestra is onstage at the Met rather than in the pit, the balances are not ideal for rich unanimity, and the p… [+1245 chars]

articles.author: Kim Lyons
articles.title: Barack Obama is narrator and host of new Netflix nature documentary - The Verge
articles.description: One of the projects that Barack and Michelle Obama have planned for their multi-year deal with Netflix is the new nature documentary Our Great National Parks. The 44th president will serve as the show’s host and narrator.
articles.content: Our Great National Parksdebuts on the streaming service on April 13th
